rules.natural: If the drug is in quarantine, then it is not the case that the drug needs testing.
The drug is in quarantine or the drug requires special handling.
Under the condition that the drug is safe for transport, the drug needs testing.
If there is a regulatory hold on the drug, then whenever the drug is in quarantine, the drug is safe for transport.
Either there is a regulatory hold on the drug, or the drug has emergency clearance.
Provided that the drug has emergency clearance, if the drug is in quarantine, then the drug is safe for transport.
The vehicle is an authorized carrier or the vehicle has a temporary permit.
Under the condition that the vehicle has a temporary permit, transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.
Provided that the drug requires a prescription, the drug is not over-the-counter.
Under the condition that the drug is temperature sensitive, it is not the case that the drug requires refrigeration.
Either the drug is temperature sensitive, or if the drug is a controlled substance, then the drug does not require licensing.
If the drug passed quality assurance, then manufacturing of the drug is complete.
The drug passed quality assurance or the drug is under expedited review.
Under the condition that the drug is under expedited review, if the drug is temperature sensitive, then the drug requires refrigeration.
Given that the drug has contamination, the drug is approved.
Under the condition that the drug is packaged properly, the drug meets standards.
If the drug is labeled correctly, then the drug is packaged properly.
Provided that the drug has final approval, if manufacturing of the drug is complete, then the drug is labeled correctly.
The drug is customs approved or the drug has diplomatic clearance.
Under the condition that the drug has diplomatic clearance, if the drug is a controlled substance, then the drug does not require licensing.
Provided that the drug has been granted an export license, an import permit has been obtained for the drug.

Either the drug has been granted an export license, or if it is not the case that if the drug is customs approved, then given that the drug is a controlled substance, the drug does not require licensing, then the drug is detained at the border.
A transit agreement has been signed for the region and the drug or it is not the case that an import permit has been obtained for the drug.
Distribution is authorized for the region and the drug or it is not the case that a transit agreement has been signed for the region and the drug.
Provided that the vehicle failed inspection, if the drug has contamination, then it is not the case that the drug is approved.
The vehicle failed inspection or there is an alternative route for the vehicle.
Under the condition that there is an alternative route for the vehicle, if the drug has contamination, then the drug is not approved.
If the drug requires special handling, then the drug does not have approval.

If it is not the case that if the vehicle has high security clearance, then if the vehicle is engaged in international transport, then provided that the vehicle is an authorized carrier, transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region, then the vehicle is for domestic use only.

Under the condition that it is not the case that transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region, it is not the case that the drug needs documentation.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the region can access the drug, or transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A10 → A11).natural: Provided that the drug is in quarantine, the drug needs testing.

(A10 → A12).natural: Whenever the drug is in quarantine, the drug is safe for transport.

(A10 → ¬A11).natural: If the drug is in quarantine, then it is not the case that the drug needs testing.

(A10 ∨ A9).natural: The drug is in quarantine or the drug requires special handling.

(A12 → A11).natural: Under the condition that the drug is safe for transport, the drug needs testing.

(A13 → (A10 → A12)).natural: If there is a regulatory hold on the drug, then whenever the drug is in quarantine, the drug is safe for transport.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either there is a regulatory hold on the drug, or the drug has emergency clearance.

(A14 → (A10 → A12)).natural: Provided that the drug has emergency clearance, if the drug is in quarantine, then the drug is safe for transport.

(A15 → G).natural: If the vehicle is an authorized carrier, then transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: The vehicle is an authorized carrier or the vehicle has a temporary permit.

(A16 → G).natural: Under the condition that the vehicle has a temporary permit, transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A17 → (A15 → G)).natural: Provided that the vehicle is engaged in international transport, if the vehicle is an authorized carrier, then transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A18 → (A17 → (A15 → G))).natural: Whenever the vehicle has high security clearance, if the vehicle is engaged in international transport, then under the condition that the vehicle is an authorized carrier, transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A2 → (A1 ∨ G)).natural: If the vehicle has clearance for the region, then either the region can access the drug or transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region.

(A21 → ¬A20).natural: Given that the drug is a controlled substance, the drug does not require licensing.

(A23 → ¬A22).natural: Provided that the drug requires a prescription, the drug is not over-the-counter.

(A24 → A25).natural: If the drug is temperature sensitive, then the drug requires refrigeration.

(A24 → ¬A25).natural: Under the condition that the drug is temperature sensitive, it is not the case that the drug requires refrigeration.

(A24 ∨ (A21 → ¬A20)).natural: Either the drug is temperature sensitive, or if the drug is a controlled substance, then the drug does not require licensing.

(A26 ∨ (A24 → A25)).natural: The drug meets standards or, if the drug is temperature sensitive, then the drug requires refrigeration.

(A27 → A26).natural: Provided that the drug passed quality assurance, the drug meets standards.

(A27 → A29).natural: If the drug passed quality assurance, then manufacturing of the drug is complete.

(A27 ∨ A28).natural: The drug passed quality assurance or the drug is under expedited review.

(A28 → (A24 → A25)).natural: Under the condition that the drug is under expedited review, if the drug is temperature sensitive, then the drug requires refrigeration.

(A29 → A26).natural: Provided that manufacturing of the drug is complete, the drug meets standards.

(A29 → A30).natural: Whenever manufacturing of the drug is complete, the drug is packaged properly.

(A29 → A31).natural: If manufacturing of the drug is complete, then the drug is labeled correctly.

(A3 → A4).natural: Given that the drug has contamination, the drug is approved.

(A3 → ¬A4).natural: Provided that the drug has contamination, it is not the case that the drug is approved.

(A30 → A26).natural: Under the condition that the drug is packaged properly, the drug meets standards.

(A31 → A30).natural: If the drug is labeled correctly, then the drug is packaged properly.

(A32 → (A29 → A31)).natural: Provided that the drug has final approval, if manufacturing of the drug is complete, then the drug is labeled correctly.

(A33 → (A21 → ¬A20)).natural: If the drug is customs approved, then given that the drug is a controlled substance, the drug does not require licensing.

(A33 ∨ A34).natural: The drug is customs approved or the drug has diplomatic clearance.

(A34 → (A21 → ¬A20)).natural: Under the condition that the drug has diplomatic clearance, if the drug is a controlled substance, then the drug does not require licensing.

(A36 → A37).natural: Provided that the drug has been granted an export license, an import permit has been obtained for the drug.

(A36 ∨ (¬(A33 → (A21 → ¬A20)) → A35)).natural: Either the drug has been granted an export license, or if it is not the case that if the drug is customs approved, then given that the drug is a controlled substance, the drug does not require licensing, then the drug is detained at the border.

(A38 ∨ ¬A37).natural: A transit agreement has been signed for the region and the drug or it is not the case that an import permit has been obtained for the drug.

(A39 ∨ ¬A38).natural: Distribution is authorized for the region and the drug or it is not the case that a transit agreement has been signed for the region and the drug.

(A5 → (A3 → ¬A4)).natural: Provided that the vehicle failed inspection, if the drug has contamination, then it is not the case that the drug is approved.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: The vehicle failed inspection or there is an alternative route for the vehicle.

(A6 → (A3 → ¬A4)).natural: Under the condition that there is an alternative route for the vehicle, if the drug has contamination, then the drug is not approved.

(A9 → ¬A8).natural: If the drug requires special handling, then the drug does not have approval.

(¬(A18 → (A17 → (A15 → G))) → A19).natural: If it is not the case that if the vehicle has high security clearance, then if the vehicle is engaged in international transport, then provided that the vehicle is an authorized carrier, transport is allowed for the vehicle, drug, and region, then the vehicle is for domestic use only.
